title: Google\Cloud\Container\V1\NodeManagement
name: NodeManagement
description:
NodeManagement defines the set of node management services turned on for the node pool.

Generated from protobuf message google.container.v1.NodeManagement

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.auto_upgrade
params.description: A flag that specifies whether node auto-upgrade is enabled for the node pool. If enabled, node auto-upgrade helps keep the nodes in your node pool up to date with the latest release version of Kubernetes.

params.name: data.auto_repair
params.description: A flag that specifies whether the node auto-repair is enabled for the node pool. If enabled, the nodes in this node pool will be monitored and, if they fail health checks too many times, an automatic repair action will be triggered.

params.name: data.upgrade_options
params.description: Specifies the Auto Upgrade knobs for the node pool.
